InvalidCrewMemberException - Exception in crew
unchecked exception to be thrown when an invalid crew member is used.

Investor - Class in crew
the CrewMember subclass Investor provides a starting bonus to a CrewState's funds and the CrewState's Ship's max shield level.
Investor(String) - Constructor for class crew.Investor
creates an Investor with the given name.
isCL() - Method in class main.GameSetup
returns whether the game is using the command line for gameplay.
isDead() - Method in class crew.CrewMember
returns True if the CrewMember is dead.
isEmpty() - Method in class items.ConsumableItem
returns whether the item has no remaining uses.
Item - Class in items
base class for items in the game.
Item(String) - Constructor for class items.Item
default constructor creates an Item with the given name with a value of 0 and no description.
Item(String, int) - Constructor for class items.Item
extended constructor creates an Item with the given name and value with no description.
Item(String, String) - Constructor for class items.Item
extended constructor creates an Item with the given name and description with a value of 0.
Item(String, int, String) - Constructor for class items.Item
extended constructor creates an Item with the given name, value and description.
ItemFindEvent - Class in eventmanager
ItemFindEvent gives a random item from the planet's loot table to the crew.
